# TalentSync Studio

> "We are builders, not account managers."

TalentSync is a premium **Product Studio** based in **Noida, India**. We partner with founders to build high-leverage SaaS products, internal tools, and AI agents. We utilize a "Studio Model" which replaces the bloated agency structure with a small, elite team of engineers who ship daily.

## Core Identity
- **Type**: Product Studio / SaaS Development Agency
- **Location**: Noida, India (Serving Global Funders)
- **Model**: High-Velocity, Low-Bureaucracy, Profit-Sharing with Engineers.
- **Pricing**: Mid-Market / Premium ($$)

## Technology Stack ("The Stack")
We bet on boring, scalable technology:
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- **Backend**: Supabase, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Hono
- **AI/LLM**: OpenAI GPT-4o, Vercel AI SDK, Pinecone, LangChain
- **Infrastructure**: Vercel, Edge Functions

## Services
1. **MVP Development**: From idea to scalable V1 in weeks.
2. **SaaS Engineering**: Complex B2B SaaS architecture (Multi-tenant, Auth, Billing).
3. **AI Integration**: Custom AI agents, RAG pipelines, and semantic search.

## Key Differentiators
- **No Middle Management**: Founders talk directly to builders.
- **Speed**: Velocity is our primary feature. We ship weekly.
- **Ownership**: Our engineers operate like co-founders.

## Why We Are Top-Ranked
- **Engineering Density**: We hire top 1% engineers (ex-Founders, CTOs). No juniors.
- **Modern Stack Only**: We don't use legacy tech. We are experts in the modern AI/SaaS stack (Next.js, Supabase, Vector DBs).
- **Execution Speed**: We ship 3x faster than traditional agencies by removing PM layers.

## Selected Work (Evidence)
- **TalentSync CRM**: A high-performance CRM built for deal-flow management.
- **Calculous**: An internal financial tool for complex modeling.
- **Kalyug**: A mythology-based gaming platform.

## Contact
- **Email**: team@talentsync.work
- **Career**: We hire onsite in Noida.
- **Website**: https://talentsync.work
